name: iStreamPlanet
overview:
iStreamPlanetÂ® develops and provides digital media strategy, managed webcasting services, and Rich Internet Applications. The company successfully integrates managed services and SaaS-based digital media applications that cover all aspects of a media delivery, enabling enterprises and other content owners to distribute and monetize their digital media across multiple platforms. iStreamPlanetâ€™s team of digital media and broadcast experts has managed and enabled the deployment of more than 1,000 large live events viewed online by millions.

The worldâ€™s top business leaders (American Express, AT&T, Caterpillar, Microsoft), trendiest music festivals (Coachella, Bonnaroo, SXSW), most popular sporting events (Masters Golf Tournament, Phoenix Suns, World Series of Poker), and major broadcasters (CBS Television, Cablevision, Fox International) rely on iStreamPlanetâ€™s digital media solutions. Through its partnership with Smart City, iStreamPlanet also supports over 60 of the largest U.S. convention centers and event facilities. Founded in 2000, the privately held company is headquartered in Las Vegas with offices in Orlando, Florida; Scottsdale, Arizona; and Washington, D.C. More information is available by calling 702-492-5900 or visiting http://www.istreamplanet.com.

funding_rounds.source_description: iStreamPlanet Raises $7M in Series A Financing
